about_the_game:
In Wildlife Rescue Simulator you are an adventurer and veterinarian. Your job is to rescue wild animals from man made disasters. When you get distress messages about entrapped animals in remote locations you get to the chopper and fly to rescue them.



Seals are often victims of fishing vessels. They are getting caught in fishnets. You need to fly to Antarctica to help them. It is hard to catch a seal and even harder to cut the strings on kicking animal. But when you manage that Seal will be forever grateful for your help.



You need to document your rescue missions by taking photos of the animals and landscapes.




When you get to your base you edit those photos to get the best of it and post it to your loyal community of followers.



People love your work and are massively commenting on your pictures and many of them donate money to the cause. You can use those donations to upgrade your equipment in order to fly further and help even more animals.

Please support development of this game by adding it to Wishlist.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 3.0 GHz or Ryzen 3xxx
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 960 4GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 (recent generation)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 1070 or better 6GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 15 GB available space

short_description: Get to the chopper and fly to isolated places to rescue terrified animals from man made disasters. Take photos of your adventures and share it with your loyal supporters to get donations. Upgrade your equipment in order to rescue even more animals.
